main.name: Mark Thomas
main.description: ReactJS by Day... React Native also by Day...
main.bio: Greetings! My name is Mark, I'm a ReactJS and React Native Developer. I've been working as a Web Developer for a few years now, and I'm now looking to join a team of developers to share my experience and to grow more than ever before.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I have a college background of Games/Web development, and I have spent the past 3 years in a Technical marketing position in Success Resources. It was here that I gained a wide range of skills and experience handling the constantly changing events industry. With tasks that range from building full websites, to setting up marketing automations for various sales campaings to even managing live events abroad. The technical/commuication/personal skills I developed in this time are invaluable and will serve me greatly in anything I choose to do in the future

work.title: Digital Marketing Executive
work.description: Main Technical Support in Success Resources UK for all projects. This involved creating many websites every month and integrating them with our marketing tools and CRM. I was also responsible for collaborating with our copywriters and graphic designers to create all marketing automations.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: I volunteered at the Tullamore CoderDojo every week to help children to advance their technical skills. I assisted them with coding, using electronics, designing games and answering any questions they were curious enough to ask.

education.degree: BSc in Digital Technology and Design

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: MERN Stack TikTok Clone
projects.category: TikTok Clone built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
